abilities.name: Elemental Mines
abilities.description: You throw out an assortment of different Traps in Front of you, applying different elemental effects to enemies that come into range.

abilities.name: Throw Everything
abilities.description: It's now or never. You use every ounce of Stamina you've got to litter the Battlefield with Traps. The more Stamina you use, the more traps you throw.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.description: Attacks upon a target's back or flank are much more likley to be killing blows.

abilities.name: Poisoned Weapons
abilities.description: You coat your weapons in a deadly toxin, making every attack poison enemies for a short time.

abilities.name: Infected Wounds
abilities.description: Your poison helps your blades and arrows bite deeper. You do more damage with your weapon while Poisoned Weapons is active

abilities.name: Flask of Frost
abilities.description: This flask coats you in an icy skin that increases your armor and freezes enemies that strike you in melee range. You can't use this ability while another elixier is active.

abilities.name: Bitter Chill
abilities.description: Activating Flask of Frost also taunts all nearby foes to attack you.

abilities.name: Dance of Death
abilities.description: You regain Stamina with every kill, the better to continue your assault.

abilities.name: Unorthodox
abilities.description: The Alchimist's mind traveles curious, twisting paths, and though her methods are strange, they are effective.

abilities.name: Alchemy Mastery
abilities.description: Any status effects caused by your Alchemy now lasts longer.

abilities.name: Fighting Dirty
abilities.description: All of your sunder and poison effects last longer as you make more potent toxins and uglier wounds.

abilities.name: Toxic Cloud
abilities.description: You unleash a cloud of toxic dust that damages all enemies that remain in the area.

abilities.name: Contact Poison
abilities.description: Toxic Cloud has a shorter cooldown time and now also poisons enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Explosive Toxin
abilities.description: Your poisons curdle the blood of your targets. Enemies that die while poisoned explode in a shower of toxic mist.

abilities.name: Knockout Bomb
abilities.description: You hurl a grenade containing a powerful concoction that puts nearby enmeis to sleep. Sleeping enemies awaken after taking damage.

abilities.name: Comatose
abilities.description: Enemies affected by Knockout Bomb sleep more deeply, allowing your allies to hit them even harder with flanking damage.

abilities.name: Mercy Killing
abilities.description: When their hearts aren't in the fight, it's almost too easy. Your attaks on panicked or sleeping enemies are automatical critical hits.

abilities.name: Flask of Fire
abilities.description: This flask coats you in flames that spur you to frenzied action. For a short time, your abilities cost no stamina, and enemies who attack you are knocked backward. You can't use this ability while another elixier is active.

abilities.name: Unquenchable Flames
abilities.description: While flask of fire is active, all of your abilties have no cooldown.

abilities.name: Ride in the Storm
abilities.description: The effects of your elixiers last longer if you activate one immediatley after another expires.

abilities.name: Killer's Alchemy
abilities.description: You can use more concentrated elixiers that give you an uncanny edge in battle. You do Bonus damage with all attacks for a short time whenever you use an elixier or a potion. The effect stacks.

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.description: You step into the shadows, all but invisble to your enemies. Attacking from stealth gives you a damage bonus and brings you back to the enemy's attention. Dealing damage to enemies reduces the ability's cooldown time.

abilities.name: Lost in the shadows
abilities.description: You live in the darkness. Entering stealth is now instant and removes all debilitating effects on you. While in stealth, you can even pass through enemies without being detected.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: While you're in Stealth and shortly after leaving it, your attacks ignore some of your target's armor.

abilities.name: Evade
abilities.description: You leap away from incoming attacks, putting yourself where you need to be to win this fight.

abilities.name: Hidden Step
abilities.description: Enemies will swear you're still there, attacking empty air and hurting nobody but themselves as you leap away.

abilities.name: Parry
abilities.description: You quickly block a strike made by your foe, then counter as their defenses fall. Requires Daggers.

abilities.name: Effortless Riposte
abilities.description: If you succeed in countering a blow, your Parry costs no stamina at all.

abilities.name: Unforgiving Chain
abilities.description: Your daggers blur, a dance of deadly pain. Each strike adds to your critical-hit chance. After a critical attack, your chain resets as you begin another dance.

abilities.name: Evasion
abilities.description: They can't hit what they can't see. Your deceptive fighting style gives you a chance to dodge enemies attacks, taking no damage.

abilities.name: Disable
abilities.description: Critical hits on an enemy reduces their damage for a short time. This effect stacks.

abilities.name: Knife in the Shadows
abilities.description: You are a deadly threat to any enemy that can't see you coming. When you attack from stealth, you automatically critically hit.

abilities.name: Twin Fangs
abilities.description: You lash out with both daggers, striking deep. With bonus damage if you flank your foe. Requires Daggers.

abilities.name: Ripping Fangs
abilities.description: If flanking, your Twin Fangs attack will keep your target's armor sundered from the blow.

abilities.name: Gaps in the Armor
abilities.description: Your attacks slip past armor to find a target's hidden vulnerabilities.

abilities.name: Flank Attack
abilities.description: You leap through shadows to attack your foe with deadly strikes that hit them from behind. Requires Daggers.

abilities.name: Skirmisher
abilities.description: Before you target turns to face your blow, you move to stealth, impossible to find.

abilities.name: Bloodied Prey
abilities.description: Your strikes cut deeper into any foe whose current halth is lower than your own.

abilities.name: Shadow Strike
abilities.description: You take your enemy by suprise with an attack they never see coming. If you are inn stealth or have not taken damage recently, this attack hits even harder.\n Precision Detonator Ability: Use on incapacitated does for a combo.

abilities.name: Quick Blade
abilities.description: Shadow Strike costs less Stamina, and when you use it while flanking an opponent, you reduce all of your active cooldown times.

abilities.name: Easy to Miss
abilities.description: Enemies are likley to overlook you in combat, much to their regret. This is especially true if you're flanking them..

abilities.name: And Take Them Down
abilities.description: Your experience with finding and pointing out enemy vulnerabilities gives the entire party a better chance to land a critical hit.

abilities.name: I Was Never Here
abilities.description: You have learned to use the distraction of an enemy's death to slip silently into the shadows. Killing a target removes any cooldown on Stealth.
